        public void standardiseNames()
                      throws com.konakart.app.KKException

      • getDateString

        public static java.lang.String getDateString(java.util.Date date)
                                      throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        This method is used to format any date string. Database can use different default date formats.
        Parameters:
        date - the Date to format
        Returns:
        The date formatted String for the database in question.
        Throws:
